biotools.summary: EchinoDB is a database consisting of amino acid sequence othoclusters from 42 echinoderm transcriptomes. We sampled taxa to span the deepest divergences within each of the 5 extant echinoderm classes. Data can be searched by keywords such as annotation and database identifiers from the Strongylocentrotus purpuratus reference protein set at NCBI.
